channel.title: I need help
channel.description: hello, i just started, and i have looked at the coomand list set my character rights to 3 but i cant spawn items. please help.

item.title: I need help
item.dc:creator: @_J_O_H_N [-J O H N-]
item.description:
@_J_O_H_N wrote:

else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("k0 d3ni3d") || playerRights >= 3)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 20000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10"); }

That should be correct.
